item.title: Background music while working
item.author: cancheta.dev@gmail.com (Charles Ancheta)
item.description: Finally found some appropriate background music for when I’m working. My peers used to always ask me what I listen to while working on my computer, and they’re always shocked to find out that I work in silence. I used to unironically listen to lofi hip hop mix ðŸ“š beats to relax/study to but I get too sleepy. When I listen to music I actually like listening to, I get too distracted.
